alert.note: Alert for Angelina; Cherokee; Nacogdoches; Rusk; Smith (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 6:16PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Smith, southwestern Rusk, northwestern Nacogdoches, northwestern Angelina and eastern Cherokee Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 616 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mount Selman to near Rusk to near Wells to near Hudson. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lufkin, Nacogdoches, Jacksonville, Whitehouse, Rusk, Hudson, Bullard, Troup, Alto, Arp, Wells, Ponta, New Salem, Trawick, Mount Selman, Pollok, Sacul, Mixon, Turnertown and Douglass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
